addr: 404 South Figueroa Street Los Angeles, CA 90071
title: Network After Work Los Angeles at Bonaventure Brewing Co.
desc: Come mingle, socialize, and network with hundreds of local professionals on Tuesday, December 8th at Bonaventure Brewing (404 S Figueroa St) from 6-9pm. With over 1 million members and 60 events across the country each month, Network After Work gets America networking. You?ll make valuable business connections in a fun and relaxed atmosphere. Build relationships with local businesses, entrepreneurs, and career-minded professionals looking to share advice, resources, referrals, and leads to help you achieve your goals.? Bring your business cards and we?ll provide name tags color-coded by industry to help attendees find the right contacts.? To RSVP Please Visit: http://losangeles.networkafterwork.com Admission Includes:? 1. Access to 300 Professionals 2. Color-Coded Name Badge 3. First Featured Cocktail before 7pm Admission: $15 in advance / $20 with RSVP at the door / $25 without RSVP
